title: Luisa Across the Bay
description: Luisa Linderman plans to read all summer long before starting her senior year of high school. When she learns that Nan, her grandmother, is seriously ill, life turns into a whole new story, across the San Francisco Bay, where she reconnects with her estranged grandparents and ex-best friend Brandon. The boy next door is all grown up and still seems to understand Luisa in a way no one else ever has. Though Nan grows more and more frail, Luisa finds love is the answer .. .even when she has to say goodbye.
author: Victoria Kahler
